kaninator.game
Class Settings

java.lang.Object
  kaninator.game.GameState
      kaninator.game.Settings

public class Settings
extends GameState

The settings state. The player can change the options for the game in this state.

Author:
phedman

Constructor Detail

Settings

public Settings(Camera _camera,
                GUI _gui,
                Keyboard _keyboard,
                Mouse _mouse,
                Canvas _canvas)
Creates the settings menu for the game, screen resolution and transparency settings are set from here.

Parameters:
_camera - The camera used to render the menu.
_gui - The gui taking care of the menu.
_keyboard - Used for input
_mouse - Used for input
_canvas - Used to set the size of the window.
See Also:
Canvas
Method Detail

render

private void render()
Renders the menu to the screen.

doState

public int doState()
The method containing the settings loop. Returns to the main menu when done.

Specified by:
doState in class GameState
Returns:
The index to the next state to be performed.
